TopicTitle: Repeated attacks of the NaN space kraken

Articles.Content:
I have a repeated problem with KSP jumping to NaN space when I go and check on a probe in interplanetary space... It's never within Kerbin's SoI or those of the moons, but only in Solar/Kerbolar SoI.

 

Any thoughts? I have been taking SoI shifts at 10x timewarp.

 

EDIT: Just tried again after freshly relaunching the game... Got half a second of it there, then NaN space As soon as the physics loads, It's gone.

Edited September 1, 2016 by MaverickSawyer
What platform (PC, Mac, Linux, console)?  If it's not console:  Stock, or modded?  And if modded, which mods?  (also, just to confirm, which KSP version?)
